General.Name: BAVARIA Industries Group AG
General.Description: BAVARIA Industries Group AG acquires and manages investments primarily in manufacturing and industrial service sectors in Germany. The company engages in civil engineering and rails, business services, automotive serial production, and plant engineering and construction activities. BAVARIA Industries Group AG was founded in 2002 and is based in Munich, Germany. The company was formerly known as BAVARIA Industriekapital AG. BAVARIA Industries Group AG is a subsidiary of AS Beteiligungen und Vermögensverwaltungs GmbH.
